Class BlackjackRound

    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.BlackjackRound

    java.lang.Runnable
    public class BlackjackRound
extends java.lang.Thread
    Logic of Blackjack single round

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlackjackRound

        public BlackjackRound​(java.lang.Boolean testMode,
                      BlackjackController gameController,
                      CasinoDAO casinoDAO,
                      Deck deck,
                      Player player,
                      Dealer dealer)
        Constructor of the round. Draws the first cards and adds them to UI. Sets needed objects for the use of BlackjackRound. Also sets tips if they are ON
        Parameters:
        gameController - is the controller to allow communication between view and model.
        deck - is used to generate and draw cards.
        player - represents the user. It's methods are called from the UI activity. Wins or loses currency.
        dealer - draws and stands through algorithm.

      • BlackjackRound

                      Dealer dealer,
                      BlackjackController gameController)
        Constructor for testing purposes only
        Parameters:
        player - Player of the round
        dealer - Dealer of the round
        gameController - Controller for communicating with the UI

    • Method Detail

      • addFirstCards

        public void addFirstCards()
        Player draws 2 cards and Dealer draws one at the start of the round

      • addFirstCardsToUI

        public void addFirstCardsToUI()
        Adds cards from addFirstCards()-method to UI

      • checkSpecialRulePossibilities

        public void checkSpecialRulePossibilities()
        Check if it is possible to split or double in game

      • playerHit

        public void playerHit()
        Called from the UI and controller when player presses "Hit". Adds drawn cards to UI, checks if the player has busted and starts dealer's turn.

      • hitToSplittedHand

        public void hitToSplittedHand()
        Hits a new card to the splitted hand

      • playerDouble

        public void playerDouble()
        Player doubles (Hits a new card and ends the turn)

      • playerInsure

        public void playerInsure()
        Sets the insurance status to true and takes the insuring money from player

      • playerSplit

        public void playerSplit()
        Player splits the hand to two hands

      • playerSurrender

        public void playerSurrender()
        Player surrenders (Round ends)

      • playerEvenMoney

        public void playerEvenMoney()
        Player calls even money (Round ends)

      • playerStay

        public void playerStay()
        Called from the UI and controller when player presses "Stand". Sets 'busted' status to false and starts the main thread.

      • setTooltips

        public void setTooltips()
        Sets possible tooltips according to the current game situation

      • whoWins

        public java.lang.String whoWins​(int playerTotal)
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method to determine the winner and/or the way of winning. Calls the methods to influence player's currency. Also sets data from the round and adds a row of the round to the history table
        Returns:
        winner/end result of the round in String
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity.

      • run

        public void run()
        This thread is started when the user's turn ends. It starts and plays the dealer's turn if needed and starts checking who won the round.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
